text.comment:
Function:

isPageVisible

Description:

检查当前页面是否对用户可见（未隐藏或最小化）。Checks if the current page is visible to the user (not hidden or minimized)

Returns:

如果页面可见则为true，如果隐藏/最小化则为false。True if the page is visible, false if hidden/minimized

Throws:

如果document不可用（非浏览器环境）则抛出错误。Throws if document is not available (non-browser environment)

Example:
// Basic usage - pause animations when page is hidden
if (!isPageVisible()) {
  // Cancel requests, pause animations, etc.
  pauseVideoPlayback();
  clearInterval(animationTimer);
}
Example:
// Listen for visibility changes
document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', () => {
  if (isPageVisible()) {
    console.log('Page is now visible');
    resumeOperations();
  } else {
    console.log('Page is now hidden');
    pauseOperations();
  }
});
Since:

1.0.0

See:
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/hidden - Browser compatibility: IE 10+, all modern browsers
  • https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/pause-stop-hide.html - WCAG accessibility guidelines for auto-playing content
